original_title: 実録!!ほんとにあった恐怖の投稿映像 25
overview: The 25th installment of a popular series that carefully selects horror videos that have been posted and introduces all 10 episodes. A psychic phenomenon caught on a security camera installed in the parking lot of a certain taxi company. It is said that none of the people involved know why such an ominous psychic phenomenon was reflected in this place...
title: Actual Record! Real Horror Posted Video 25
